finetuned.fintune 1: Put a watering can on the black desk at any time. Simultaneously, place a white and a gold bottle on the desk. After placing the bottles, pick up some keys to look at them under a tall lit lamp. Once done, put a remote inside a box and then place the box on a black table.
finetuned.fintune 2: Put a remote inside a box then place the box on a black table at any time. Simultaneously, pick up some keys to look at them under a tall lit lamp. After placing the remote, place a white and a gold bottle on the desk. Once done, put a watering can on the black desk.
finetuned.fintune 3: Place a white and a gold bottle on the desk at any time. Simultaneously, put a watering can on the black desk. After placing the bottles, put a remote inside a box and then place the box on a black table. Once done, pick up some keys to look at them under a tall lit lamp.
